scripts.start: concurrently "yarn workspace server run start" "yarn workspace client run start" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.start-electron: concurrently "yarn workspace server run start" "yarn workspace client run dev" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.test: echo "Error: no test in root directory" && exit 0
